brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts a router is connected to three switches, one each on Floor 1, Floor 2, and Floor 3. The switch on Floor 3 is connected to three servers. The switch on Floor 2 is connected to three clients. The switch on Floor 1 is connected to three clients.

The Accounting V LAN comprises one server from Floor 3, one client from Floor 2, and one client from Floor 1.
The Marketing V LAN comprises one server from Floor 3, one client from Floor 2, and one client from Floor 1.
The Engineering V LAN comprises one server from Floor 3, one client from Floor 2, and one client from Floor 1.
